duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize AWS services, such as Lambda, S3, ECS, and Security Models, to build/deploy API and make them available to customers.
Implement build servers for Red Hat Linux and experience with monitoring tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, and OP5 for automation of builds, deployments, testing, and infrastructure using Ansible.
Maintain using Terraform for provisioning, Ansible for automating software configuration, and used Templates for AWS infrastructure as code using Terraform to build staging and environments.
Build/Maintain Docker container clusters managed by Kubernetes.
Use Ansible playbook to set up Continuous Delivery pipeline, Deploy microservices, including AWS environment using Ansible Playbook.
Implement Ansible to manage all existing servers and automate the build/configuration of new servers.
Involve in requirement gathering phase of SDLC with Business Analyst and work in Agile-Scrum methodology.
